documentation.author: Cerner Model
documentation.purpose: This rule will track and increment a count of rehab visits for each day that treatment time is documented. When approaching 10 visits, this rule will send out messages and add tasks to ensure a g-code is completed by the 10th visit.
documentation.explanation: When treatment time is documented on an adult patient in the appropriate encounter type, this rule will check to find any previous treatment time documentation from the same calendar day. If no previous results for treatment time have been documented on the same day, this rule will increment the visit count DTA by 1. When the count reaches 8 visits, a Discern Notify message is sent to the documenting user to warn the patient is approaching 10 visits. At 9 visits, the rule will also add a one-time task for assigning modifier to Primary Functional Limitation. At 10 visits, a message will display and ask for the required G-code.
documentation.impact:
Template L4 needs to be reinstantiated with appropriate encounter types for which this rule will fire.
Templates A4, A6, and A9 include references to Word Processing templates that must be imported before this rule will fire appropriately. Use "File > Import > Import Word Processing Templates" utility in Discern Developer to add those templates.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_EVAL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2

statements.statement: eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go /* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

eks_event_set_name_refhelp PAR1, "EVENT_SET" go
/* SELECT IF (PAR1="*ANY") EVENT_SET_NAME="*ANY_EVENT_SET_NAME" ELSEIF (PAR1="ALL") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSE EVENT_SET_NAME= V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,V.EVENT_SET_NAME)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ENDIF */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_INCOMING_REQ_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2

statements.statement:
eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go
/* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

eks_event_set_name_refhelp PAR1, "EVENT_SET" go
/* SELECT IF (PAR1="*ANY") EVENT_SET_NAME="*ANY_EVENT_SET_NAME" ELSEIF (PAR1="ALL") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSE EVENT_SET_NAME= V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,V.EVENT_SET_NAME)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ENDIF */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXEC_CCL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Execute PROGRAM_NAME with parameters OPT_PARAM and link to OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_RESULT_UNITS (with OPT_NUM_DEC_PLACES decimal places) on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert.OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_NOTIFY
templateDefinitions.definition: send subject SUBJECT with message MESSAGE to LOCATION linked to procedure PROCEDURE with priority PRIORITY under categories CLASS and SUBCLASS

column.value: Clinical Event End Date and Time
Clinical Event End Date and Time

statements.statement: select c.display_key ,c.cdf_meaning ,c.code_value from code_value c where c.code_set=220 and c.active_ind= 1 and c.begin_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) and c.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) and NOT c.cdf_meaning in ("ROOM","BED","FACILITY","BUILDING", "APPTROOT","BBDRAW","BBOWNERROOT","BBINVAREA", "COLLROOT","COLLRTE","COLLRUN","CSLOGIN","CSTRACK", "HIM","HIMROOT","INVGRP","INVLOC","INVLOCATOR","INVVIEW") and NOT c.cdf_meaning in ("MICRO STATIS","MMGRPROOT", "PTTRACK","PTTRACKROOT","PTRECYCLE","RXLOCGROUP","SRVAREA", "STORAGERACK","STORAGEROOT","STORAGESHELF","STORAGETRAY", "STORAGEUNIT","SURGFILL") order c.display_key

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ADD_ONE_TIME_TASK_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Add a TASK_PRIORITY TASK_CLASS one time task of TASK_DESCRIPTION with task date/time equal to ANCHOR_DT offset by OPT_OFFSET_DAY days, OPT_OFFSET_HOUR hours and OPT_OFFSET_MIN minutes to encounter LINK.
templateDefinitions.description: Add a TASK_PRIORITY TASK_CLASS one time task of TASK_DESCRIPTION with task date/time equal to ANCHOR_DT offset by OPT_OFFSET_DAY days, OPT_OFFSET_HOUR hours and OPT_OFFSET_MIN minutes to encounter LINK.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_MESSENGER_ESC_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send message to OPT_RECIPIENT and/or OPT_FT_RECIPIENT with subject OPT_SUBJECT, text OPT_MSG and a OPT_PRIORITY priority related to ESC_LINK. Delay escalation of the message for TIME_INTERVAL TIME_UNIT and STOP_FLAG escalation.
templateDefinitions.description: Send escalation message to printer, email, alphapager

values.value: To FullAudit for this module only
Assign PT Modifier for Primary Function
